In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) P, Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H : forall a : list (Term A n), inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM a Q -> inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM a P a, b : list (Term A n) M1_min : forall x : mon n, ~ ltM x (zero_mon n) ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ~ ltM x x ltM_trans : transitive (mon n) ltM ltM_wf : well_founded ltM ltM_plusr : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n x z) (mult_mon n y z) ltM_plusl : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) H1 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q a b H2 : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q b Unable to unify "inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM ?M2219 P" with "eqP A eqA n a b".

original: intros P Q H a b H0 H1. induction H1. - auto. - inversion_clear H0. apply IHreducestar. + auto. + apply H. auto.
